Translation: Dogen, don't worry. I know where your brains are. They're in... like, this crazy, dream-thorn-bush-straight-jacket-tower place.

Translation: Hackey sack?

Translation: You go to the TV lounge. I'm on the case. I just need a little more advanced training to prepare

Translation: They stole Dogen's brains!

Translation: I had a nightmare where this mad scientist guy said he was going to take them out and--

Translation: Was it a creepy-looking freak with a shower cap and a stainless steel, three pronged claw?

Translation: I don't know, but I think it's time I find out where this is coming from.

Source string: Once I get trained in Levitation I'll be able to see the rest of the nightmare and get more information.
Translation: Once I get trained in Levitation I'll be able to see the rest of the nightmare and get more information.

Translation: Let's rendezvous tonight at the old boathouse for debriefing.

Translation: He's been broadcasting his insane plot all over camp in his sleep!

Translation: So he's really kidnapping children and stealing their brains to make weapons!

Translation: Lili, a deranged madman is building an army of psychic death tanks to take over the world, and there's no one who can stop him except for you and me!

Translation: Sorry! I'm just so excited!

Source string: Since you showed up, Raz, things are so much more exciting!
Translation: Since you showed up, Raz, things are so much more exciting!

Source string: Sinister death plots! Mad scientists!
Translation: Sinister death plots! Mad scientists!

Source string: Hideous monsters!
Translation: Hideous monsters!

Source string: Make out?
Translation: Make out?

Translation: How long have I ignored what this camp had to offer? Everything's new to me now thanks to you! I mean, look at this flower!

Source string: You mean, like... kiss?
Translation: You mean, like... kiss?

Translation: How many years have I been coming here and I've never even noticed a cool flower like this before?

Source string: Ahhhh--ooof!

Translation: Oh, no! You didn't just hit my boyfriend!

Translation: Lili!!!

Translation: Hey, Lili.

Translation: Going for the advanced training? What's the rush?

Translation: Are you kidding? I only have a few days to become a Psychonaut or I lose my shot forever!

Translation: Look, Raz, I hate to burst your bubble, but the Psychonauts are not what they used to be.

Source string: Times have changed. The world just doesn't need us anymore.
Translation: Times have changed. The world just doesn't need us anymore.

Source string: The world does too need Psychonauts!
Translation: The world does too need Psychonauts!

Source string: Right here at this very camp, in fact. I think there are several fishy things that need psychic investigating.
Translation: Right here at this very camp, in fact. I think there are several fishy things that need psychic investigating.

Source string: You are so immature!
Translation: You are so immature!

Source string: And cute! When are you gonna just shut up and kiss me?
Translation: And cute! When are you gonna just shut up and kiss me?

Source string: Shut up and do what?
Translation: Shut up and do what?

Source string: Oh. I didn't know you could--uh, I gotta go. Bye.
Translation: Oh. I didn't know you could--uh, I gotta go. Bye.

Source string: So embarrassing!
Translation: So embarrassing!

Source string: Gah!
Translation: Gah!

Source string: Hey, was that you? Looking at me?
Translation: Hey, was that you? Looking at me?

Source string: Maybe you should try getting over yourself? There were a lot of other people on that stage besides you.
Translation: Maybe you should try getting over yourself? There were a lot of other people on that stage besides you.

Source string: No, just now. In the woods.
Translation: No, just now. In the woods.

Source string: (sniff sniff)
Translation: (sniff sniff)

Source string: No, it must have been something else.
Translation: No, it must have been something else.

Source string: You don't smell like pond scum.
Translation: You don't smell like pond scum.

Source string: Nice. You should write greeting cards.
Translation: Nice. You should write greeting cards.

Source string: Hey, if you want to cut class later, try these smelling salts.
Translation: Hey, if you want to cut class later, try these smelling salts.

Source string: They'll pop you out of anyone's mind and back to the real world before you can say, Crud! That hurts my nose!
Translation: They'll pop you out of anyone's mind and back to the real world before you can say, Crud! That hurts my nose!

Source string: Out of anyone's mind?
Translation: Out of anyone's mind?

Source string: You'll find out.
Translation: You'll find out.

Source string: Now, mush! We don't want you to be late for class!
Translation: Now, mush! We don't want you to be late for class!

Source string: Why do you care if I'm late for class?
Translation: Why do you care if I'm late for class?

Source string: Because the late thing is MY thing. Don't copy.
Translation: Because the late thing is MY thing. Don't copy.

Source string: There was some sort of shadowy being out there... lurking... watching...
Translation: There was some sort of shadowy being out there... lurking... watching...

Source string: I know of only one creature who fits that description. It likes to hide in dark places, silently watching unsuspecting children from a distance.
Translation: I know of only one creature who fits that description. It likes to hide in dark places, silently watching unsuspecting children from a distance.

Source string: Really? Who?
Translation: Really? Who?

Source string: You, tree sitter!  Hahahaha!
Translation: You, tree sitter!  Hahahaha!

Source string: Way to make us look bad in there! You're in trouble now! Bobby Zilch ain't happy.
Translation: Way to make us look bad in there! You're in trouble now! Bobby Zilch ain't happy.

Source string: You better watch yourself, Gogglicious.
Translation: You better watch yourself, Gogglicious.

Source string: What's that, Hair Boy? You want a piece of me?
Translation: What's that, Hair Boy? You want a piece of me?

Source string: Hey, brainiacs. Settle down.
Translation: Hey, brainiacs. Settle down.

Source string: Why? You worried I'm gonna hurt your boyfriend?
Translation: Why? You worried I'm gonna hurt your boyfriend?

Source string: No. Because Sasha Nein is standing right behind you.
Translation: No. Because Sasha Nein is standing right behind you.

Source string: Your performance, young cadet, was outstanding. I'd like you to report to my lab for some advanced training.
Translation: Your performance, young cadet, was outstanding. I'd like you to report to my lab for some advanced training.

Source string: Oooh! Raz the Spaz is gonna be in the "special" class. Benny, remind me to give him a "special" beating later, okay?
Translation: Oooh! Raz the Spaz is gonna be in the "special" class. Benny, remind me to give him a "special" beating later, okay?

Source string: These tests are unauthorized, though, so I can't actually ask you to come. But if you happened to drop in, well, what could I do? Let me just give you this...
Translation: These tests are unauthorized, though, so I can't actually ask you to come. But if you happened to drop in, well, what could I do? Let me just give you this...

Source string: Remember:
Translation: Remember:

Source string: Your talent will always set you apart, Razputin.
Translation: Your talent will always set you apart, Razputin.

Source string: Sometimes isolation is a good thing. It can lead to important discoveries.
Translation: Sometimes isolation is a good thing. It can lead to important discoveries.

Source string: Wait, I don't even know where your lab is! Is this some kind of test?
Translation: Wait, I don't even know where your lab is! Is this some kind of test?

Source string: And now I'm hearing things. Great.
Translation: And now I'm hearing things. Great.

Source string: Coach! Out in the woods! I saw--
Translation: Coach! Out in the woods! I saw--

Source string: You're late, Soldier!
Translation: Ти запізнився, солдате!

Source string: Get in here and give me twenty!
Translation: Марш сюди, двадцять відтискань!

Source string: Sir! We need to get a containment team in the area STAT!
Translation: Sir! We need to get a containment team in the area STAT!

Source string: I've spotted a U.P.E.
Translation: I've spotted a U.P.E.

Source string: A U.P.E.?
Translation: A U.P.E.?

Source string: Yes, an Unregistered Paranormal Entity, possibly aquatic in nature...
Translation: Yes, an Unregistered Paranormal Entity, possibly aquatic in nature...

Source string: I know what a U.P.E. is, son. I just don't know how YOU know.
Translation: I know what a U.P.E. is, son. I just don't know how YOU know.

Source string: From "True Psychic Tales" Issue 424, sir!
Translation: From "True Psychic Tales" Issue 424, sir!

Source string: Where Sasha Nein fought that clairvoyant grizzly bear?
Translation: Where Sasha Nein fought that clairvoyant grizzly bear?

Source string: Pah! Comic books!
Translation: Pah! Comic books!

Source string: This thing was real, and huge, and--and it smelled all smelly!
Translation: This thing was real, and huge, and--and it smelled all smelly!

Source string: Save your fish stories for the boathouse, boy.
Translation: Save your fish stories for the boathouse, boy.

Source string: The human mind.
Translation: Людський розум.

Source string: Six hundred miles of synaptic fiber, five and a half ounces of cranial fluid, fifteen hundred grams of complex neural matter...
Translation: Дев'ятсот шістдесят шість кілометрів синаптичного волокна, сто шістдесят два мілілітри черевної рідини, півтора кілограма нервових клітин...

Source string: A three pound pile of dreams.
Translation: Трифунтова купа мрій.

Source string: But I'll tell you what it really is.
Translation: Але скажу я вам, що насправді...

Source string: It is the ultimate battlefield--and, the ultimate weapon.
Translation: Це водночас і найнебезпечніше поле бою, і найпотужніша зброя.

Source string: The wars of this modern age--The Psychic Age--are all fought somewhere between these damp, curvaceous undulations.
Translation: Усі війни сучасної доби, психічної доби, ведуться серед цих вологих, в'юнистих звивин.

Source string: AND YOU! DO YOU KNOW WHAT YOU REALLY ARE?
Translation: А ВИ! ЧИ ЗНАЄТЕ, ХТО ВИ НАСПРАВДІ?

Source string: Well. I'll tell you that too.
Translation: Це я вам теж розповім.

Source string: From this day forward, you are all Psychic Soldiers.
Translation: Відсьогодні, ви всі — психосолдати.

Source string: Paranormal Paratroopers!
Translation: Паранормальні парашутисти!

Source string: Mental Marines who are about to ship out on the adventure of their lives!
Translation: Ментальна морська піхота, яка прямує човном на головну пригоду свого життя!

Source string: THIS IS OUR BEACHHEAD.
Translation: ЦЕ НАШ ПЛАЦДАРМ.

Source string: And this is your landing craft!
Translation: А це — місце вашої висадки!

Source string: You shall engage the enemy in his own mentality! You shall chase his dreams, you shall fight his demons, you shall live his nightmares!
Translation: Ви нападете на ворога зсередини! Ви гнатиметеся за його мріями, битиметеся з його демонами та переживатимете його жахи!

Source string: And those of you who fight well, you will find yourselves on the path to becoming international secret agents. In other words...
Translation: І ті з вас, хто проявить себе якнайкраще, йтимуть шляхом становлення міжнародними секретними агентами. Одним словом...

Source string: Psychonauts!
Translation: Психонавтами!

Source string: The rest of you... WILL DIE.
Translation: Решта з вас... ПОМРЕ.

Source string: Waaaaaaaa!
Translation: В-а-а-а-а!

Source string: Oh, Morry.
Translation: Ох, Моррі.

Source string: Children, you are not going to die.
Translation: Дітки, звісно, ви не загинете.

Source string: Well, if you're not a Psychonaut, then you might as well be dead!
Translation: Ну, якщо не станете психонавтами, то краще вже померти!

Source string: They told me this was a Summer Camp!
Translation: Мені казали, що це просто літній табір!

Source string: Ah, Dogen. Don't worry about ol' Coach Oleander. I've been coming here for years, and trust me--nothing ever happens.
Translation: Ой, Доґене. Не переймайся через тренера Олеандра. Я вже не перший рік сюди їжджу, і повір мені, ніколи нічого не ставалося.

Source string: Yeah, Dogen. Lili's right. You don't got nothin' to worry about... 'cept for that giant monster in the lake I was telling you about.
Translation: Та, Доґене. Лілі права. Нема чого боятися... крім того велетенського озерного чудовиська, про якого я тобі казав.

Source string: Bobby Zilch! I told you to stop scaring people with that ridiculous, old legend!
Translation: Боббі Зілч! Я кому казав припинити лякати людей тією дурною, старою байкою!

Source string: I don't want the kids to be afraid to go out at night and walk alone on the perfectly safe paths of Whispering Rock Psychic Summer Camp.
Translation: Діти не мають боятися виходити на прогулянку нічними та повністю безпечними стежками літнього психотабору «Шепіткий Камінь».

Source string: And we don't want to scare our special guests, superstar Psychonauts Sasha Nein and Milla Vodello!
Translation: І також ми не хочемо відлякати наших суперзіркових гостей, психонавтів Сашу Найна та Міллу Воделло!

Source string: Whoa--
Translation: Ой-йой...

Source string: Lake monster!
Translation: Озерне чудовисько!

Source string: Formation!
Translation: Усі на позиції!

Source string: It's resisting.
Translation: Воно пручається.

Source string: What is it?
Translation: Що це?

Source string: It's just a little boy! What's your name, darling?
Translation: Та це ж просто хлопчик! Як тебе звати, серденько?

Source string: I'll find out!
Translation: Зараз дізнаюся!

Source string: Can't... get... in... ach!
Translation: Він... не... пускає... ах!

Source string: My name...
Translation: Моє ім'я...

Source string: ...starts with a "D"
Translation: Починається на «Д»...

Source string: ...is Razputin.
Translation: Разпутін.

Source string: Grr.
Translation: Гр-р.

Source string: But everybody calls me Raz.
Translation: Але всі кличуть мене «Раз».

Source string: Please don't kill us, lake monster!
Translation: Не вбивай нас, озерне чудовисько!

Source string: Compelling.
Translation: Сміливо.

Source string: Armored like a tank!
Translation: Непробивний мов танк!

Source string: Sorry I'm late. I don't want to disrupt your briefing, Agent Oleander.
Translation: Вибачте за запізнення. Не хотів переривати ваш брифінг, агенте Олеандр.

Source string: Agents Nein, Vodello.
Translation: Агенти Найн, Воделло.

Source string: Please, continue.
Translation: Будь ласка, продовжуйте.

Source string: Where do you think you're going?
Translation: Куди це ти зібрався?

Source string: You've broken into a highly-classified, remote government training facility.
Translation: Ти проник до надсекретного урядового навчального центру.

Source string: I know! Isn't it great? Listen, why don't I just sit over here quietly with my fellow PSI Cadets--
Translation: Знаю! Хіба не чудово? Слухайте, чому б мені просто тихенько не сісти поряд з моїми колегами-псикадетами...

Source string: Hey, how's it going? I like your hat!
Translation: Гей, як справи? Класний капелюх!

Source string: We need to have this young man taken from here immediately.
Translation: Нам потрібно негайно забрати звідси цього юнака.

Source string: I'll call his parents.
Translation: Я зателефоную його батькам.

Source string: What? But... don't you train Psychonauts here?
Translation: Що? Хіба не тут... тренують психонавтів?

Source string: Yes, darling, but--
Translation: Так, серденько, але...

Source string: To soar across the astral plane?
Translation: Мандрувати астральним планом?

Source string: To wage psychic warfare against the enemies of free thought?
Translation: Вести психічну війну проти ворогів вільних думок?

Source string: That is what I wrote on the front of the pamphlet...
Translation: Саме про це я писав на обкладинці брошури...

Source string: Those words are why I'm here, Coach Oleander. Do you remember what you wrote on the inside of that pamphlet?
Translation: Саме ці слова й привели мене, тренере Олеандр. Пам'ятаєте, як там далі йшлося?

Source string: "You were born with a special gift. But the people around you treat it like a curse. Your mother is afraid of you, and your father looks at you with shame in his eyes. Come to Whispering Rock Psychic Summer Camp, and you can show them all! Back home, your powers make you a loner, an outcast, a circus freak. But in this dojo, in this Psychic dojo, they make you a hero."
Translation: «Ти народився з особливим даром. Але люди навколо вважають його прокляттям. Твоя мати боїться тебе, а батьку навіть соромно дивитися. Приходь до літнього психотабору «Шепітний Камінь», і ти покажеш їм усім! Вдома твої сили роблять тебе зайвим, ізгоєм, цирковим виродком. Але в цьому доджьо, екстрасенсорному доджьо, вони роблять тебе героєм».

Source string: Get that soldier a bunk!
Translation: Виділіть солдату койку!

Source string: Now, darling. You can stay here for a few days until your parents come for you. But we can't let you participate in any paranormal training without your parents' consent. I'm sorry.
Translation: Отже, серденько. Ти залишатимешся тут протягом кількох днів, поки батьки тебе не заберуть. Але ми не можемо дозволити тобі брати участь в будь-якій паранормальній підготовці без згоди батьків. Мені шкода.

Source string: Wowee. You're so lucky. You get to go home soon.
Translation: Ого. Пощастило тобі. Скоро будеш вдома.

Source string: Home? Back there I was just like you were Dogen--punished by my own family for having powers I never asked for.
Translation: Вдома? Там до мене ставилися як до тебе, Доґене. Карали за сили, яких я не просив.

Source string: But here, I have a chance to be something. To make a difference.
Translation: Але тут у мене з'явився шанс проявити себе. Стати корисним.

Source string: They may come for me, Dogen, but they'll be looking for Raz, the boy. What they're going to find
Translation: Навіть якщо вони прийдуть, Доґене, вони шукатимуть звичайного хлопчика Раза, а натомість знайдуть...

Source string: What they don't expect, is Raz, the Psychonaut.
Translation: Того, кого не очікують. Раза-психонавта.

Source string: And--and--and then you'll make their heads explode?
Translation: І...і...і ти підірвеш їхні голови?

Source string: No! Do you do that?
Translation: Ні! А ти так робив?

Source string: No!
Translation: Ні!

Source string: No! Well, once kinda. But, now I wear this special hat. Wanna try it on?
Translation: Ні! Ну, один разочок. Але тепер у мене цей спецкапелюх. Хочеш примірити?

Source string: No no no!
Translation: Ні-ні-ні!

Source string: But he has mental defenses like I've never seen in someone so young. If I could just get him in my lab for some experiments, I'm sure he could withstand more than the others!
Translation: Його ментальний захист не за роками міцний. От якби ж я привів його в лабораторію для експериментів, він би витримав ще більше!

Source string: That kid's one in a million, Nein. But I'm not going to let you turn him into one of your guinea pigs!
Translation: Він такий один на мільйон, Найне. Я не дозволю тобі перетворити його на піддослідного кролика!

Source string: I've got big plans for that mind.
Translation: У мене на нього великі плани.

Source string: Quickly, bring it over here
Translation: Quickly, bring it over here

Source string: Ahhh!
Translation: Ahhh!

Source string: Hmm. That should not have happened. We need to try that again.
Translation: Hmm. That should not have happened. We need to try that again.

Source string: Oh, I don't think I need to be in the Tumbler with the glowy eye guys anymore.
Translation: Oh, I don't think I need to be in the Tumbler with the glowy eye guys anymore.

Source string: Suit yourself.
Translation: Suit yourself.
